alert.note: Alert for Dauphin; Lancaster; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 8:20PM EDT until June 26 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Dauphin County in south central Pennsylvania... Northwestern Lancaster County in south central Pennsylvania... North central York County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 900 PM EDT. * At 820 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bainbridge, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hershey, Colonial Park, Weigelstown, Elizabethtown, Progress, Middletown, Palmyra, Linglestown, Steelton, Hummelstown, Paxtonia and Stonybrook-Wilshire. This includes the following Interstates... The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 245 to 258. Interstate 81 from mile markers 70 to 81. Interstate 83 between mile markers 22 and 36, and from mile markers 45 to 50. Interstate 283 from mile markers 0 to 2. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
